channel.title: Sophie Walker / @SophieRunning
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @SophieRunning. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title:
RT by @SophieRunning: In the end it wasn't the "powerful" men, it was a young girl who stood before the world and took an oath.
I'm not the least bit surprised.
item.dc:creator: @ErinBrockovich
item.description:
In the end it wasn't the "powerful" men, it was a young girl who stood before the world and took an oath.

I'm not the least bit surprised.

item.title: RT by @SophieRunning: I named the tables in my class Barbara, Kenneth, Alan & Gloria, mainly for my own amusement. Today I said Barbara could go & line up first. One kid shouted out ‘Because we’re Babulous!’. My work here is done.
item.dc:creator: @PhilippaMiss
item.description: I named the tables in my class Barbara, Kenneth, Alan & Gloria, mainly for my own amusement. Today I said Barbara could go & line up first. One kid shouted out ‘Because we’re Babulous!’. My work here is done.

item.title: This is so dreadfully sad. What a light she shone, what a bright, bright smile and what campaigning energy right to the end. Condolences to all family and friends of @bowelbabe for such a loss.
item.dc:creator: @SophieRunning
item.description:

item.title: RT by @SophieRunning: BREAKING: Metropolitan Police has been placed in special measures after litany of failures including Sarah Everard murder, Stephen Port investigation etc - sources confirming reports by @theousherwood
item.dc:creator: @PippaCrerar
item.description: BREAKING: Metropolitan Police has been placed in special measures after litany of failures including Sarah Everard murder, Stephen Port investigation etc - sources confirming reports by @theousherwood

item.title: If Barack Obama couldn’t be bothered to ensure women’s abortion rights were fully secure, how safe do you think they are with Boris Johnson? Organise, organise, organise. Resist, resist, resist. #RoeVsWade #abortionrights #mybodymychoice
item.dc:creator: @SophieRunning
item.description:
If Barack Obama couldn’t be bothered to ensure women’s abortion rights were fully secure, how safe do you think they are with Boris Johnson? Organise, organise, organise.
Resist, resist, resist.
#RoeVsWade #abortionrights #mybodymychoice

item.title:
RT by @SophieRunning: The @metpoliceuk say women should be “alert but not alarmed” after Zara Aleena was beaten to death by a stranger in a random attack yesterday morning.
The police can kindly do one. This is alarming. Telling women how we should feel is insulting.
item.dc:creator: @journokatie
item.description:
The @metpoliceuk say women should be “alert but not alarmed” after Zara Aleena was beaten to death by a stranger in a random attack yesterday morning.

The police can kindly do one. This is alarming. Telling women how we should feel is insulting.

item.title: On the basis of sex… so very old hat, until they come for your body, your rights, your education, and everyone else with the same shared characteristic as you is suffering, but you can’t say why.
item.dc:creator: @SophieRunning
item.description:
On the basis of sex… so very old hat, until they come for your body, your rights, your education, and everyone else with the same shared characteristic as you is suffering, but you can’t say why.

item.title: When they say they’re protecting lives, they mean men’s lives. Men’s power. Men’s agency. Don’t ever forget what this is really about. #RoeVsWade
item.dc:creator: @SophieRunning
item.description: When they say they’re protecting lives, they mean men’s lives. Men’s power. Men’s agency. Don’t ever forget what this is really about. #RoeVsWade

item.title: It’s estimated that abortion access is going to be cut off for 36 million women, the ramifications of which will be felt for decades. If you’re wondering what to do - you could help @BPAS1968 lobby the U.K. govt to take a stand for our sisters👇
item.dc:creator: @SophieRunning
item.description:
It’s estimated that abortion access is going to be cut off for 36 million women, the ramifications of which will be felt for decades. If you’re wondering what to do - you could help @BPAS1968 lobby the U.K. govt to take a stand for our sisters👇

item.title: RT by @SophieRunning: We are not powerless. Here’s what I’m fighting for: Expanding our Senate majority so we can eliminate the filibuster & codify Roe. Expanding the Supreme Court to rebalance this institution. Defending abortion rights in states through ballot measures and downballot elections.
item.dc:creator: @ewarren
item.description: We are not powerless. Here’s what I’m fighting for: Expanding our Senate majority so we can eliminate the filibuster & codify Roe. Expanding the Supreme Court to rebalance this institution. Defending abortion rights in states through ballot measures and downballot elections.
